mapper.select: select c.cart_no, c.user_id, c.product_no, c.qty ,p.product_name, p.off_price, p.price, p.product_img, (p.price-p.off_price) as discount from carts c join products p on c.product_no = p.product_no where user_id=#{userId} order by cart_no
mapper.insert: insert into carts(cart_no, user_id, product_no, qty) values (carts_no_seq.nextval, #{userId}, #{productNo}, #{qty})
